experience.title: Market Analyst
experience.description: - Actively managed a portfolio consisting of US Treasury, SOFR, Fed-Funds Futures contracts & short-term interest rate instruments listed on CME & CBOT exchanges.- Achieved top 10% ranking among analysts at the firm, generating the highest percentage of algorithmic trading volumes, while having a 78% total algorithmic fill rate spread over strategies.- Realized a 83.33% accuracy rate and reward-risk ratio of 5:1 by executing a time-based automated strategy that capitalized on extreme market volatility in Treasury Futures.- Accelerated execution speeds by 75% by implementing automated algorithms with TT-Excel integrations to create real -time dashboards to track changes in SOFR 3Mo Interest Rate Curve.- Utilized data analysis tools such as MS EXCEL, Thomson Reuters Eikon, and Bloomberg terminal to generate market insights and trade opportunities based on economic trends and historical data analysis.
experience.description_html: - Actively managed a portfolio consisting of US Treasury, SOFR, Fed-Funds Futures contracts & short-term interest rate instruments listed on CME & CBOT exchanges.- Achieved top 10% ranking among analysts at the firm, generating the highest percentage of algorithmic trading volumes, while having a 78% total algorithmic fill rate spread over strategies.- Realized a 83.33% accuracy rate and reward-risk ratio of 5:1 by executing a time-based automated strategy that capitalized on extreme market volatility in Treasury Futures.- Accelerated execution speeds by 75% by implementing automated algorithms with TT-Excel integrations to create real -time dashboards to track changes in SOFR 3Mo Interest Rate Curve.- Utilized data analysis tools such as MS EXCEL, Thomson Reuters Eikon, and Bloomberg terminal to generate market insights and trade opportunities based on economic trends and historical data analysis.

experience.title: Market Analyst
experience.description: - Quantified market potential and understood product requirements for SriLanka and Nepal.- Conducted extensive market research and analysis to identify emerging trends, customer needs and competitive landscapes informing strategic decision-making.- Received Letter of Recommendation from the Co-founders for excellent performance during the internship.
